plot: Luna suffers from Child Development Syndrome. When movie star, Cameron, is hired to play the part of someone with the disorder, Luna becomes the case study that changes Cameron's life forever.
title: Luna Butterflys
plot_es: Luna suffers from Child Development Syndrome. When movie star, Cameron, is hired to play the part of someone with the disorder, Luna becomes the case study that changes Cameron's life forever.
plot_en: Luna suffers from Child Development Syndrome. When movie star, Cameron, is hired to play the part of someone with the disorder, Luna becomes the case study that changes Cameron's life forever.
